caption:
"A glossy ceramic bathtub with white coloring and an oval shape. Smooth, curved interior with a drain at the bottom. Designed for bathing purposes. Positioned against a yellow wall in a bathroom setting."

"A possibly plastic container-type object with beige coloring and cylindrical shape. Rounded top and visible lid. Likely used for storage or as a decorative item. Located on a wooden floor near a door and other household items."
